text: Haldibari () is a rural municipality (gaunpalika) out of seven rural municipality in Jhapa District of Province No. 1 of Nepal. There are a total of 15 municipalities in Jhapa in which 8 are urban and 7 are rural. According to Ministry of Federal Affairs and Local Developme Haldibari has an area of and the total population of the municipality is 29,223 as of Census of Nepal 2011. == References == Category:Municipalities of Nepal
title: Haldibari Rural Municipality
